I'm expecting everything to go according to plan... I've just got to be patient and take it one day at a time. Hopefully I'll be with the Eagles next year, but we'll see what happens. He commented on a significant step back to superstardom: His first endorsement deal since his return to the NFL in 2009. the White House and Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. The book's publisher, Nation Books, says millions followed the speech online, crashing the Senate server. A print book is due out next month. An electronic book will be published Jan. 28. Craigslist
